data.title: Here's all you need to know about Milind Soman's wife Ankita Konwar
data.meta_description: Before you get the first pics of the newlyweds, here are some details about Milind and Ankita's love life... - Here's all you need to know about Milind Soman's wife Ankita Konwar
data.text:
The internet is on fire since yesterday from the time the news of Milind Soman tying the knot with Ankita Konwar was out. The model-turned-actor has been quite vocal about his relationship with his 26-year-old girlfriend who was also a senior flight attendant. The lovebirds will be exchanging their wedding vows in a traditional Assamese marriage in Alibaug which will be a private ceremony, attended by only close friends and family. The attendees have kept on sharing pictures on social media and that is how everyone is updated about the events. From the haldi, mehendi to the last night’s sangeet, the occasion grabbed our attention for not only the picturesque decorations but also the romantic moments of Ankita and Milind. (Also Read: [WATCH VIDEO] Milind Soman and Ankita Konwar shake a leg on Ishq Sufiyana before taking the wedding vows)

Before you get the first pictures of the newlyweds, here are some details about Milind and Ankita’s love life…

Ankita hails from Guwahati, Assam. Born in a Hindu family, her father’s name is Niranjana Konwar and mother’s name is Nagen Konwar. The would be wife of Milind has also a sister named Jharna Konwar Baruah. She was a senior flight attendant previously but gave it up in February 2018. Other than Hindi and English, she can speak Bengali, French and Assamese.

Apart from all these, Ankita is a sports enthusiast who completed her first 10k marathon with would be husband Milind Soman in 2015. According to the reports the couple had been dating since last October and has even received blessings from Milind’s mother.

Milind who has been previously married to French actress Mylene Jampanoi in 2006 had faced a lot of criticism for dating young Ankita. But they have always given back to the trolls in their unique way and remained strong every time.

Ankita and Milind will get hitched today in Alibaug and we are too excited about it.

Are you excited to see Milind and Ankita’s marriage pictures? Let us know in the comments below. For more scoops and updates, stay tuned to BollywoodLife.
